title: How exactly do you do Headbutt+Pulverize combo??
body: I swear I do it sometimes and sometimes I don't and I'm not sure what I'm doing differently...

replies.body: IMO easier if you pulverize then casually knock them over to the direction you desire.
Don't use smart cast, mash Q as soon as you start to dash, it used to be really hard to do but Riot catered to bronzers.

When you dash for the Headbutt, hold down your Q and it should  knock them up again after the dash. I haven't played him in a while though so it might not work. That is how I remember doing it though.
Ahh holding down? I'll give that a go

I haven't played Ali for a while but I don't remember that it was easier to have your w off smartcast and when you click to cast the spell you roll your finger onto q. Maybe try a bots game and practice it?
Goodluck

Yeha maybe putting it on Normal Caat might be easier... But I can just see myself forgetting to put it back on Smart Cast between different games and ending up fucking up a play and putting myself behind lol.
